          <language>sv</language>
          <title>
            <string language="sv">Links - Module 6</string>
            <string language="en">Links - Module 6</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Links - Modul 6</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Liens - Module 6</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ligações - Módulo 6</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Collegamenti - Modulo 6</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Συνδέσεις - ενότητα 6</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Conexiones - Módulo 6</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="sv">Here you find links that you can use to find out more about school and school systems in The Republic of Ireland, England, Scotland, Wales, The United States and Australia.Safir - English and Working Life for Beginners - Module 6 - What Would You Like?</string>
            <string language="en">Here you find links that you can use to find out more about school and school systems in the Republic of Ireland, England, Scotland, Wales, The United States and Australia. Safir - English and Working Life for Beginners - Module 6 - What Would You Like?</string>
          </description>

            <string language="sv">Safir</string>
            <string language="sv">English</string>
            <string language="sv">language</string>
            <string language="sv">facts</string>

            <string language="sv">Australia</string>
            <string language="sv">The United States</string>
            <string language="sv">the United Kingdom</string>
            <string language="en">Sapphire</string>
            <string language="en">English</string>
            <string language="en">language</string>
            <string language="en">facts</string>
            <string language="en">school</string>
            <string language="en">school systems</string>

          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hier finden Sie Links, die Sie verwenden können, 
um mehr über Schule und Schulsysteme in der Republik von Irland, von 
England, von Schottland, von Wales, von Vereinigten Staaten und von 
Australien herauszufinden. Safir - Englisch und Berufsleben für
Anfänger - Modul 6 - was wurden Sie mögen?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Voici que vous trouvez les liens que vous pouvez 
employer pour découvrir plus au sujet de l'école et des systèmes 
scolaires dans la République de l'Irlande, de l'Angleterre, de 
l'Ecosse, du Pays de Gales, des Etats-Unis et de l'Australie. 
Safir - l'anglais et vie active pour des débutants - module 6 -
que aimez-vous ?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Aqui você encontra as ligações que você pode 
usar encontrar para fora mais sobre a escola e os sistemas de escola 
na república de Ireland, de Inglaterra, de Scotland, de wales, dos 
estados unidos e de Austrália. Safir - vida do inglês e de 
funcionamento para novatos - módulo 6 - que  você gosta?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Qui trovate i collegamenti che potete usare per 
scoprire più circa la scuola ed i sistemi scolastici nella Repubblica
di Irlanda, Inghilterra, Scozia, Galles, unito Dichiara e 
l'Australia. Safir - inglese e vita attiva per i principianti - 
modulo 6 - che cosa gradite?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εδώ βρίσκετε τις συνδέσεις που μπορείτε να 
χρησιμοποιήσετε για να ανακαλύψετε περισσότερος για το σχολείο και
τα σχολικά συστήματα στη Δημοκρατία της Ιρλανδίας, της Αγγλίας, 
της Σκωτίας, της Ουαλίας, των Ηνωμένων Πολιτειών και της 
Αυστραλίας. Safir - αγγλική και οικονομικά ενεργή ζωή 
για τους αρχαρίους - ενότητα 6 - τι θα θέλατε;</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Aquí usted encuentra las conexiones que usted 
puede utilizar para descubrir más sobre escuela y sistemas escolares 
en la república de Irlanda, de Inglaterra, de Escocia, de País de 
Gales, de los Estados Unidos y de Australia. ¿Safir - inglés y 
vida laboral para los principiantes - módulo 6 - qué  usted tiene 
gusto?</string>
          </description>
